entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries this evening. 40 percent chance of flurries near the Rockies overnight. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 19 April 2023
